README.md:
# konochiyutoriarunoShi iFang 


## Zhun Bei 

Yi Xia noShuo Ming de, `$`deShi maruXing ha, kibodokaraRu Li surukomandowoBiao shimasu. 
Xian Tou no`$`haChu ite, nokoriwoRu Li shitekudasai. 

gitwoinsutorushi, komando

```
$ git clone git@github.com:space-weather-KU/bbt-sw.git
```

woShi Xing suruka, aruihakonopezinoShang noFang niaru"Download ZIP"botankarahuairuYi Shi woShou niRu retekudasai. 

Ci ni, Quan Mao Hua Xiang woYong Yi shimasu. 
Hou Shu noASIRRA Cat and Dog image corpus
http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/projects/asirra/corpus.aspx
kara 885MB noMao Quan Hua Xiang detasetsutowodaunrodosuruka, aruihaUSBmemorikaraShou ketotsute, 
sakihodogithubkaraShou niRu retahuoruda(`cat-or-dog.py`nadogaarutokoro)ni, PetImages/Cat huorudaoyobi
 PetImages/Doghuorudagaaruyounishitekudasai. 



python, pipwoinsutorushitekudasai. soshite, komando

```
$ pip install --user chainer
```

woShi Xing shite, chainer (1.8Yi Jiang )woinsutorushiteXia sai. konpiyutaShi noHuan Jing deha, Shang Ji nokomandodeRu ruhazudesu. 



## Ji Jie Xue Xi noShi Xing 

konoZhuang Tai de, 
```
$ ./cat-or-dog.py
```
woShi Xing suruto, Quan toMao noHua Xiang nimotodukuXue Xi gaShi marimasu. Xue Xi Jie Guo ha`model.save`oyobi `state.save`toiu2tsunohuairunisebusaremasu. 

Shi Fen Xue Xi saserumadeShu Shi Jian Dai tsuka, aruihaCi nokomandodeYu meXue Xi Ji minosebudetawoYi Dong shitekite, 
```
$ mv learned/* .
```

Ci noyounishite, aruHua Xiang gaMao kaQuan kawoPan Ding Chu Lai masu. 
```
$ ./cat-or-dog.py PetImages/Cat/0.jpg
Load model from model.save state.save
PetImages/Cat/0.jpg  is a  cat
```

Zi Fen deCuo tsutaXie Zhen ya, intanetsutoShang karaTan shitekitaHua Xiang demoShi shitemitekudasai. 

```
~/hub/bbt-sw (master)$ ./cat-or-dog.py tama.jpg
Load model from model.save state.save
tama.jpg  is a  cat
```

## Yu Zhou Tian Qi Yu Bao tonoGuan Xi ha?

konopuroguramuwoYing Yong shite, tatoeba[aruShi Ke noTai Yang Hua Xiang ] kara[24Shi Jian Hou niQi koruhureanokurasu(X,M,C)] woYu Ce shitari, [72Shi Jian Hou madeniQi koruZui Da nohureanoGui Mo (W/m^2)] nitsunageteikimasu. 

Ta nimo, [Hua Xiang karaHe kanoFen Lei Shu Zhi woYu Ce suru] toiuYang "naYong Tu niYing Yong dekimasu.
